summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plats 29East and 29W, page 89 and 90 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 2201 Aurora Avenue North and the Boston Street Right of Way from Single Family 5000 (SF 5000) to Commercial one with a 65-foot height limit (C1-65') and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Ray Head (C.F. 299227, Appl. 9205454)
